I am a web developer specialized in Frontend technologies, passionate about creating sleek, functional, and user-friendly interfaces. I believe digital experiences should be smooth and accessible to everyone, and I strive to transform abstract ideas into tangible, high-performance products.

whatIDoDescription.en:
In my work, I design and develop tailored software solutions, focusing on integrating complex systems and optimizing business processes. I primarily use React and related technologies to handle complex application states, build modular and reusable components, and ensure clean, efficient, and maintainable code over time.


My goal is to deliver scalable and high-performing products that meet real business needs, enhancing productivity and user experience.

secondary_skills.it:
Sviluppatore specializzato nell'ecosistema JavaScript/TypeScript. La mia expertise principale Ã¨ in React (Web e Native), ma possiedo gli strumenti per curare l'intero stack tecnologico, dal database all'interfaccia utente.


  • Frontend Core: React (Avanzato), Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SCSS.
  • Backend Core: Node.js, Express.js, Supabase.
  • Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB.

secondary_skills.en:
Specialized developer in the JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem. My main expertise is in React (Web and Native), but I have the tools to care for the entire technology stack, from the database to the user interface.

  • Frontend Core: React (Avanzato), Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SCSS.
  • Backend Core: Node.js, Express.js, Supabase.
  • Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB.
  • Version Control: Git, GitHub, GitLab.
  • Design Tools: Figma

description.it: Ottimizzo l'interazione con modelli linguistici avanzati (LLM) per generare contenuti di alta qualitÃ , automatizzare workflow complessi e sviluppare soluzioni basate sull'intelligenza artificiale generativa con precisione chirurgica.
description.en: I optimize interactions with Advanced Language Models (LLMs) to generate high-quality content, automate complex workflows, and develop generative AI-based solutions with surgical precision.

description.it: Sviluppo interfacce web moderne, scalabili e ad alte prestazioni utilizzando React e Next.js. Mi concentro sulla scrittura di codice pulito, sull'accessibilitÃ  e sull'ottimizzazione dei Core Web Vitals per un'esperienza utente eccellente.
description.en: I develop modern, scalable, and high-performance web interfaces using React and Next.js. I focus on writing clean code, ensuring accessibility, and optimizing Core Web Vitals for an excellent user experience.

description.it: Progetto esperienze digitali intuitive e visivamente accattivanti. Trasformo requisiti complessi in wireframe e prototipi interattivi, ponendo l'utente al centro del processo creativo per massimizzare l'engagement e l'usabilitÃ .
description.en: I design intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences. I transform complex requirements into wireframes and interactive prototypes, placing the user at the center of the creative process to maximize engagement and usability.
